subject: Golf
Probation and Parole
lead_paragraph: The PGA Tour winner and rising star Dustin Johnson was arrested Monday and charged with driving under the influence in South Carolina, the police said. Johnson, 24, won the AT&T Pebble Beach National Pro-Am in February, his second career PGA Tour victory.
